metadata.name: Triple Cross eBPF Rootkit Execve Hijack
metadata.comment: Detects execution of a the file "execve_hijack" which is used by the Triple Cross rootkit as a way to elevate privileges

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/sudo')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('execve_hijack')))

output.summary: Detects execution of a the file "execve_hijack" which is used by the Triple Cross rootkit as a way to elevate privileges
